title.narrative: HIV IR6.1:MULTICOUNTRY-PPTCT SERVICES

description.narrative: HIV&AIDS Programme Component Results (PCR) 6 IR6.1: By 2017, at least six PICs have PPTCT, HIV Testing & Counselling and ART policies/ guidelines and services in line with the international and global recommendations., which contributes to Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: HIV&AIDS Programme Component Results (PCR) 6: Pregnant women and adolescents aged 15-19 years, particularly those who are at higher risk to HIV exposure, have increased access to relevant information, skills and services to prevent and reduce impact of HIV.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: HIV&AIDS PCR 6 IR6.1: By 2017, at least six PICs have PPTCT, HIV Testing & Counselling and ART policies/ guidelines and servicesin line with the international and global recommendations.

description.narrative: Fiji, Solomon Islands, and Vanuatu have fully integrated prevention of parent-to-child transmission of HIV into maternal and child health services resulting in the provision to women of information on HIV and testing for HIV during their routine antenatal care visits. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2017

title.narrative: National HIV/AIDS strategies that include proven high-impact evidence-based interventions to address HIV among adolescents available

Number of health facilities in focus PICs providing quality integrated HIV testing & counselling and PMTCT services. Baseline: Fiji-4, Samoa-4, Kir-7, Sol-10, Van-10, Target: Fiji-50, Samoa-20, Kir-25, Sol-30, Van-30,
(NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) Existence of a national HIV and AIDS Prevention, PMTCT, Treatment and Care Strategy
HIV and AIDS Prevention, PMTCT, Treatment and Care Strategy available
